vegetables, and breakfast

You will need a bigger dose 
of folic acid that requires a 
prescription if:
• you already have a baby 
with	spina	bifida;
• you have coeliac disease;
• you have diabetes or had 
gestational diabetes in a 
previous pregnancy. 
Finding it hard to get 
pregnant?
It can take several months 
or more to get pregnant, 
even if it happened really 
quickly	the	first	time.
